mapper.select: select * from county where projectcode=#{projectcode} and state=1
mapper.update: update county set state=0 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT c.`countycode`,c.`countyname` FROM county c LEFT JOIN level_management ON c.`countycode` = level_management.`countycode` WHERE (level_management.countycode AND c.`state`=1 AND c.`projectcode`=#{projectcode}) IS NULL

SELECT c.`countycode`,c.`countyname` FROM county c LEFT JOIN level_management ON c.`countycode` = level_management.`countycode` WHERE (level_management.countycode AND c.`state`=1 AND c.`projectcode`=#{projectcode}) IS NULL
AND c.`countyname` LIKE concat('%',#{countyname},'%')
AND c.`countycode` LIKE concat('%',#{countycode},'%')
limit #{page},#{pageSize}
